transArray.content: I stayed at the Hanting Hotel on a business trip with my colleagues. The overall feeling was pretty good. The room was clean and tidy. The lady at the front desk had a very good service attitude and made people feel very considerate. It is very close to Chaoyang Station and the train station. The transportation is very convenient, and there is a free ticket at the door. The parking lot is quite suitable for those who travel by car. There is a buffet breakfast on the first floor. It tastes pretty good. It is recommended to stay here.

Hello dear, thank you for your affirmation of our work. The hotel is disinfected every day, and every detail of my location has been wiped with alcohol, so you can feel at ease in the room. There is Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station 700 meters away from the hotel. , it is very convenient to travel and is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. It is your best choice for travel. There is nothing you can’t think of and nothing you can’t find. We look forward to your next visit!
